item.title: KubeCon NA 2019
item.description: It wasn’t my first time flying. It also wasn’t the first time I had arrived at the airport early enough to require multiple cups of coffee. As I sat at my gate, however, I did find myself wondering for the first time: had I ever heard the words “Lambda,” “stateful set”, and “yaml” while waiting to board? You see, a bunch of us were coming from all over to attend KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2019.
